EmailTemplate.name: 201809_Americas_Webinar_GoDirect_mih.201809_Americas_Reminder_1hour_Webinar_GoDi
EmailTemplate.subject: REMINDER - Webcast - GoDirect™ Jet ConneX Service Plans
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> WEBCAST REMINDER Dear {{lead.First Name:default=customer}},
Our webcast, GoDirect™ Jet ConneX Service Plans will start in one hour!
Please click the link below to join the webcast. https://honeywell.zoom.us/j/342437450 <[[https://honeywell.zoom.us/j/342437450]]>
In case Zoom has not been pushed to your PC, please download <[[https://zoom.us/download]]>.
See you soon!
Sincerely,
Honeywell Aerospace Event Team
